title: Lance Thompson (rugby league, born 1961)
text:
Lance Thompson (born 23 July 1961) is an Australian former professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played for the <a href="Balmain%20Tigers">Balmain Tigers</a> and the <a href="Newtown%20Jets">Newtown Jets</a> in the <a href="New%20South%20Wales%20Rugby%20League%20premiership">New South Wales Rugby Football League</a> (NSWRFL).
Thompson, a shearer's son from the town of <a href="Nyngan">Nyngan</a>, started his NSWRFL career at Balmain. He appeared as Balmain's <a href="five-eighth">five-eighth</a> in the first two rounds of the <a href="1980%20NSWRFL%20season">1980 NSWRFL season</a>, then didn't play first-grade until 1983, when he was with Newtown. In his only first-grade season for Newtown he played 13 premiership games, as a five-eighth, centre and winger.
